problem.markdown:
>>The column I’ve designed fails in compression. If I decrease the height of the column, what happens to the allowable load?<<
( ) The allowable load will decrease ( ) The allowable load will increase (x) The allowable load will remain the same
[explanation] Compression failures are governed only by the force and cross-sectional area, height is not a factor (beyond self-weight…). [explanation]
